name: FCostIngredientEffectActorInfo
comment: Copyright 2016-2018 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

properties.name: ItemClass
properties.comment: What class is this cost of

properties.name: SpawnDelay
properties.comment: Delay between this and the previous cost actor spawned

properties.name: TargetLocation
properties.comment: Where this cost actor should travel to

properties.name: MeshFNames
properties.comment: Component FName for each material interface

name: UFGMaterialEffectComponent
comment: Base class for material based effects on actors.

methods.name: SetMeshes
methods.comment: Set the meshes to override material on, cannot be called after PreStarted.

methods.name: GetMeshes
methods.comment: Get the meshes which have the overridden material.

methods.name: GetMeshesBounds
methods.comment: Get the bounds of the meshes.

methods.name: SetDuration
methods.comment: Set the duration for this effect [seconds]. This is not replicated.

methods.name: GetDuration
methods.comment: Get the duration for this effect. [seconds]

methods.name: PreStarted
methods.comment: Called prior to the build effect starting and before the materials have been overridden.

methods.name: OnStarted
methods.comment: Called when the effect has been started and the materials have been overridden.

methods.name: OnEnded
methods.comment: Called when the effect has ended and the material overrides have been cleared.

methods.name: OnUpdate
methods.comment: Called when the effect is updated.

methods.name: SetMaterialScalarParameterValue
methods.comment: Set a scalar parameter on the effect.

methods.name: TryGetFNameFromMeshComponent
methods.comment: Helper to try and deduce the name of the mesh element on a given mesh component (Used to track changes to applied meshes between start and end of Material Effect)

properties.name: mOnStarted
properties.comment: Called when material effect has finished.

properties.name: mOnEnded
properties.comment: Called when material effect has finished.

properties.name: mMeshes
properties.comment: Meshes affected by the material effect.

properties.name: mAutoDestroy
properties.comment: Should this effect be auto destroyed on finish.

properties.name: mMids
properties.comment: The cached mids we apply effects to.

properties.name: mOverrideMaterials
properties.comment: The cached override materials present before initializing (Takes into account custom override materials on meshes)
